name: track_package
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool amex_australia_fastway_australia_tracking.
Tool description: Tracking API for Aramex Australia also know as Fastway Australia. For any questions please contact support@logicsquares.com
API description: Tracks a package's shipping details using a provided tracking number and the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number of the package to be tracked.
